steps.name: Verify client debts can be change from UI
check via api that the simple client has been created
search a new client by phone number
assert - search returns one customer in UI

parameters.name: data
parameters.value: ClientCreateRequest(is_filling_up_sent=false, status=3sWV7hudQ6, permitAds=true, birthdate=05-30, birthyear=1969, address=Apt. 281 4221 Honey Curve, Kianaland, NY 70842, debts=[{"date":"2023-04-28 16:29:52","desc":"uhJxEtAMMQ","sum":841054043}], phone=["0501-11-40-92"], email=rasheeda.hartmann@hotmail.com, notes=[{"added":"2023-04-28 16:29:52","text":"ljes4QjrwG"}], name=Mr. Donald Torphy, gender=female)

steps.name: search client by new phone number via api
assert via api that the client debts has been updated by comparing name and address

assertThat 'ClientCreateRequest(is_filling_up_sent=false, status=3sWV7hudQ6, permitAds=true, birthdate=05-30, birthyear=1969, address=Apt. 281 4221 Honey Curve, Kianaland, NY 70842, debts=[{"date":"2023-04-28 16:29:52","desc":"uhJxEtAMMQ","sum":841054043}], phone=["0501-11-40-92"], email=rasheeda.hartmann@hotmail.com, notes=[{"added":"2023-04-28 16:29:52","text":"ljes4QjrwG"}], name=Mr. Donald Torphy, gender=female)'

usingRecursiveComparison '- no overridden equals methods were used in the comparison (except for java types)
- these types were compared with the following comparators:
  - java.lang.Double -> DoubleComparator[precision=1.0E-15]
  - java.lang.Float -> FloatComparator[precision=1.0E-6]
  - java.nio.file.Path -> lexicographic comparator (Path natural order)
- actual and expected objects and their fields were compared field by field recursively even if they were not of the same type, this allows for example to compare a Person to a PersonDto (call strictTypeChecking(true) to change that behavior).
'

assertThat 'ClientCreateRequest(is_filling_up_sent=false, status=3sWV7hudQ6, permitAds=true, birthdate=05-30, birthyear=1969, address=Apt. 281 4221 Honey Curve, Kianaland, NY 70842, debts=[{"date":"2023-04-28 16:29:52","desc":"uhJxEtAMMQ","sum":841054043}], phone=["0501-11-40-92"], email=rasheeda.hartmann@hotmail.com, notes=[{"added":"2023-04-28 16:29:52","text":"ljes4QjrwG"}], name=Mr. Donald Torphy, gender=female)'

isEqualTo 'ClientGetResponse(id=2972, name=Mr. Donald Torphy, phone=0501114092, profileImage=41.svg, address=Apt. 281 4221 Honey Curve, Kianaland, NY 70842, status=3sWV7hudQ6, permitAds=false, isUnsubscribed=false, lastAppointment=null, phoneCanonical=+972501114092)'
